name: 100-Coins
description:
100 Coins is an easy yet very addicting game. Simply tap and hold to release the colorful balls into the rotating pipes without losing any! See how long you can last in this simple one touch game!

As the game goes on, different colored pipes will appear. Balls dropped in colored pipes will change color and are worth more points! The game ends if you lose all the pipes or balls!

Some Awesome Features:
• Realistic physics engine;
• Single tap control;
• Quick games!
• Leaderboards
• Awesome sounds and music

If you're looking for a fun time-waster, you've found it! Download it today!

------------------------------------------------------------
